attributes.action: Ask all the religious leaders to CRB check their incumbents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ask all the religious leaders to CRB check their incumbents. This is to make sure that only the people are considered reliable and morally qualified by a certified religious establishment. Doing so would enable the incumbents to have a better relationship with their attendees. Is it possible to have evidence that they have been CRB checked in accordance to their religion regulations? The attendees of the place of worship should have a right to request proof that they have been CRB checked.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
